meanings.definition: The quality or state of being ultrarealistic.
meanings.sent1: Her ultrarealism in painting captured every tiny detail of the flower.
meanings.sent2: The artist's ultrarealism in his sculptures made them look like they could come to life.
meanings.sent3: The ultrarealism of the movie's special effects made the audience do a double-take.
meanings.sent4: His ultrarealism in storytelling made the listeners feel like they were part of the tale.
meanings.sent5: The ultrarealism of the photograph made it hard to believe it wasn't a painting.

meanings.definition: A style of art characterized by extreme realism and attention to detail.
meanings.sent1: The museum featured a stunning exhibit of ultrarealism paintings.
meanings.sent2: Art students were inspired by the ultrarealism of the famous artist's work.
meanings.sent3: The ultrarealism of the portrait made it seem like the subject could step out of the frame.
meanings.sent4: The writer's ultrarealism in describing the setting painted a vivid picture in the reader's mind.
meanings.sent5: The ultrarealism of the sculpture made it hard to distinguish from a real person.
